condition: [AND]([EQ](<*VALUE(ACE Node Rack Mount Cabinet)*>,0),[EQ](<*VALUE(ACE Node Tower Mount Desk)*>,0))
name: Hide_ACE_control
action: <*DISALLOWATTRIBUTES(ACEControl Libraries SW License,ACE Hiway Output Extension Library,ACE OPC Extension Library,ACE Rapid Restart License,ACE UCN Output Extension Library)*>
description:
These questions will be displayed to User,
 If qty of ACE Node -Tower Mount (Desk) >0, AND/OR qty of ACE Node - Rack Mount (Cabinet)  >0,
Else, hidden
